tool_description: Generate QR code images using this API for any text and a custom logo image.
name: QR Generator Generator with Logo
title: QR Generator Generator with Logo

api_list.name: QR Code Generator
api_list.description: Generate the QR Code for the given payload with data and logo image in base64. Returns a base64 image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-generator-generator-with-logo.p.rapidapi.com/api/qr/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-generator-generator-with-logo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-generator-generator-with-logo.p.rapidapi.com/api/qr/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-generator-generator-with-logo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
